participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and responsible, Emily is dedicated to her family and profession.
participant_1.background: I drive a van because it's spacious and I can take my friends along to watch Scooby Doo at the drive-in theater. i am a doctor. My pets are a great way to teach my kids about responsibility and compassion. i have a vacation home in the mountains. I'm a young adult who doesn't want my parents to know about my deployment.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Creative and thoughtful, Oliver has a passion for design and values his family.
participant_2.background: I enjoy a fresh cup of coffee every morning and worry about my cats while on tour. I once went to the Amazon rainforest, where I encountered a tribe that had never heard of sweet potatoes. My favorite type of fruit is watermelon, it is sweet and refreshing, and it reminds me of summer. I would be unable to be a fashion designer if I were blind because I would not be able to see the colors or fabrics. I am so happy to be close to my parents and my daughters are really excited about our new home.

content.text: Hey! What do you do for a living?
I'm a fashion designer! I love what I do, but it can be stressful at times.
I can imagine! I'm a doctor, and it can definitely be stressful. But it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I have a lot of respect for doctors.
Thanks! I have two kids, and I'm really happy to be close to my parents.
That's great! I love my parents, too.
I have a van because it's spacious and I can take my friends along to watch Scooby Doo at the drive-in theater.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I enjoy a fresh cup of coffee every morning, and I worry about my cats when I'm on tour.
I'm not sure I've ever been on tour, but I can definitely understand worrying about your cats.
It's tough! But I always make sure they're taken care of.
That's good to hear. I'm sure they appreciate it.
It sounds like you have a lot going on in your life, but I'm glad you're happy.
Thanks! I am happy. I'm grateful for my family and friends, and I love my job.
